S

Screen - Class in menus
This represents a screen where user interactions can take place, and it can be drawn.
Screen(int, int) - Constructor for class menus.Screen
This constructs a new screen with the given width and height
SCREEN1 - Static variable in interface menus.ScreenSwitcher
SCREEN1 represents the index of the first PApplet screen which is the main menu screen
SCREEN2 - Static variable in interface menus.ScreenSwitcher
SCREEN2 represents the index of the second PApplet screen which is the select screen
SCREEN3 - Static variable in interface menus.ScreenSwitcher
SCREEN3 represents the index of the third PApplet screen which is the rule screen
SCREEN4 - Static variable in interface menus.ScreenSwitcher
SCREEN4 represents the index of the fourth PApplet screen which is the game screen
SCREEN5 - Static variable in interface menus.ScreenSwitcher
SCREEN5 represents the index of the fifth PApplet screen which is the end screen
ScreenSwitcher - Interface in menus
This is the interface which allows the screen to be switched
SelectScreen - Class in menus
This represents a PApplet screen that can have user interactions.
SelectScreen(DrawingSurface, BattleScreen) - Constructor for class menus.SelectScreen
Constructs a select screen with a width of 800 and a height of 600.
setHealth(int) - Method in class pokemon.Pokemon
This sets the health of the pokemon to the given amount
setLevel(double) - Method in class pokemon.Pokemon
This adds to the level of the pokemon
setMaxHealth() - Method in class pokemon.Pokemon
This sets the maximum health of the Pokemon based on the Pokemon's level
setMoveName(int, String) - Method in class pokemon.Pokemon
This sets the name of a move
setP1(Pokemon) - Method in class game.Game
This sets the first pokemon
setP2(Pokemon) - Method in class game.Game
This sets the second pokemon
setProtected(boolean) - Method in class pokemon.Pokemon
This sets the pokemon's protection status
setSpeedBase(int) - Method in class pokemon.Pokemon
 
settings() - Method in class menus.DrawingSurface
Sets the size of the current screen
setTurn(int) - Method in class game.Game
This sets which player currently has the turn
setup() - Method in class menus.DrawingSurface
Sets up the screens
setup() - Method in class menus.Screen
This sets up the screen
setWinner(int) - Method in class menus.EndScreen
This sets the string text which appears on the PApplet surface with the player that won.
Squirtle - Class in pokemon
This represents a Squirtle pokemon
Squirtle() - Constructor for class pokemon.Squirtle
Constructs a Squirtle with the attributes of a generic pokemon
Squirtle(int, int) - Constructor for class pokemon.Squirtle
Constructs a Squirtle with the given health and level
switchScreen(int) - Method in class menus.DrawingSurface
This switches the current screen.
switchScreen(int) - Method in interface menus.ScreenSwitcher
This method switches the PApplet screen that is displayed
